<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"getFiles"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/files"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



A list of filtered [Files](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/files/FileBrowser). Each File response contains its [URI](https://docs.ganymede.bio/sdk/FileTags#get_file_url), which is its unique identifier.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"createdBefore","required":false,"in":"query","description":"epoch time in milliseconds","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"createdAfter","required":false,"in":"query","description":"epoch time in milliseconds","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"pageNumber","required":false,"in":"query","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"pageSize","required":false,"in":"query","description":"number between 1 and 10000. default is 10000","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"tag","required":false,"in":"query","description":"a tag in the format of tagName:tagValue","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of filtered Files","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"uri":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"creator":{"type":"string"},"createdAt":{"type":"number"},"size":{"type":"number"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"required":["id","type","value"],"title":"Tag"}}},"required":["uri","name","createdAt","size"],"title":"File"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
